TextEng: Hey! Leave my stuff alone! Stop you thief!
Text: 이봐! 내 물건에서 손 떼! 멈춰 이 도둑놈아!

TextEng: Get out of my hovel, you beasts! Leave me alone! Oh, it's just you, <FirstName>. When my locked door suddenly opened, I thought the kobolds were back.
Text: 내 오두막에서 나가, 이 짐승들아! 날 내버려 둬! 아, <FirstName>이구나. 잠긴 문이 갑자기 열리니까 코볼트들이 돌아온 줄 알았어.

TextEng: If you are hunting kobolds, there's none in here. THEY got the point when they found the door locked and left. Just goes to show, I suppose. So, is the fighting done?
Text: 코볼트를 사냥하는 거라면, 여기엔 없어. 놈들은 문이 잠겨 있는 걸 보고 알아서 갔거든. 그럴 줄 알았지. 그래서, 싸움은 끝났어?

TextEng: Lousy, snooping adventurers; always going into other people's homes and stealing their stuff.
Text: 빌어먹을, 기웃거리는 모험가들이란. 항상 남의 집에 들어가서 물건을 훔치지.

TextEng: Oh, right then. I think I will. Just to be safe.
Text: 아, 그래. 그렇게 할게. 안전을 위해서.

TextEng: What ever. Just be gone.
Text: 뭐 어쨌든. 그냥 가버려.

TextEng: You bashed down my door, so I have nothing to stop any other hungry monsters from wandering into my house and having a little Toman snack, and now you just want to chat a little? Hmm?
Text: 내 문을 부쉈으니까 배고픈 괴물들이 내 집에 들어와서 토만 간식을 먹는 걸 막을 게 없는데, 이제 그냥 잡담하자고? 응?

TextEng: Anything else, or has the stench of my poverty finally driven you off?
Text: 다른 건 없어, 아니면 내 가난의 악취가 드디어 널 쫓아낸 거야?

TextEng: I suppose so, if you really want to. I imagine it might cost me two gold pieces to replace it, though it did need replacing anyways. The wood was getting a little soft.
Text: 정말 원한다면 그렇게 할게. 교체하는 데 금화 두 개쯤 들겠지만, 어차피 교체가 필요하긴 했어. 나무가 좀 물러지고 있었거든.

TextEng: Oh, never mind. I know where there's a little abandoned cabin, not too far from here. I can just take the door off of it. It's in better shape than mine was anyways. What do you want?
Text: 아, 됐어. 여기서 멀지 않은 곳에 작은 버려진 오두막이 있는 걸 알아. 거기서 문을 떼어오면 돼. 어차피 내 것보다 상태가 좋거든. 뭘 원해?

TextEng: Nothing much recently, unless you include the Red Wizard who came to town. I tremble at the thought of those Thayvians coming here. Evil folk they are.
Text: 최근엔 별일 없어, 마을에 온 붉은 마법사를 빼면. 저 테이인들이 여기 온다는 생각에 떨리네. 사악한 놈들이야.

TextEng: Last I heard, the mayor and his assistant were going to throw him out of town. I don't know what happened though, the kobolds attacked before he got an audience with the mayor.
Text: 마지막으로 들은 바로는, 시장과 보좌관이 그를 마을에서 쫓아낼 거라더라. 무슨 일이 있었는지는 모르겠어, 그가 시장과 만나기 전에 코볼트들이 공격했거든.

TextEng: My guess is he'll be headed out of town. Good riddance and none too soon if you ask me! Other than that, there's the halfling caravan and that's about all I know.
Text: 내 생각엔 그가 마을을 떠날 거야. 내가 보기엔 잘 됐고 빨리 떠날수록 좋아! 그 외에는 하플링 대상이 있고 내가 아는 건 그게 다야.

TextEng: Little thieves, that's what they are! Good thing I don't have nothing for them to steal. I have kept my distance, just in case though. I don't know why they're here.
Text: 작은 도둑놈들, 그게 그들이야! 다행히 내겐 훔칠 게 없어. 혹시 모르니까 거리를 뒀지. 왜 여기 있는지 모르겠어.

TextEng: I think you would get along with them. You could pick each other's pockets and locks and all that sort of nonsense. For a man like me, I avoid getting to close, just in case.
Text: 난 네가 그들과 잘 어울릴 것 같아. 서로의 주머니와 자물쇠를 따고 그런 헛짓거리를 할 수 있겠지. 나 같은 사람은 혹시 모르니까 가까이 가지 않아.

TextEng: Well, they look a fair bit like you, which makes sense I suppose. I have kept my distance from them, since some around here claim they're just a bunch of thieves anyways.
Text: 글쎄, 그들은 너와 꽤 비슷하게 생겼는데, 당연한 것 같아. 여기 사람들 중 일부가 그들은 그냥 도둑떼라고 주장하니까 거리를 뒀어.

TextEng: I don't know anything more about them, but you can go speak to them if you wish. Their caravan is right down the road from here. Anything else?
Text: 그들에 대해 더 아는 건 없어, 하지만 원하면 가서 말해봐. 그들 대상은 여기서 길 아래에 있어. 다른 건?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> You are such a bad liar. You just came here to rob me. So why don't you go ahead and do that? I don't have hardly anything other than this hovel.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 넌 정말 거짓말을 못하는구나. 그냥 날 털러 온 거잖아. 그러니까 그냥 해버리지 그래? 이 오두막 말고는 거의 가진 게 없어.

TextEng: Maybe you should just kill me and loot my home! Maybe you'll even find a couple of silver pieces!
Text: 그냥 날 죽이고 내 집을 털지 그래! 은화 몇 개쯤은 찾을 수 있을 거야!

TextEng: Uh... oh, you wouldn't really do that would you? I don't want to die. But I really am poor. I am just a little overwrought, what with the attack and all. Any other questions?
Text: 어... 아, 진짜 그러진 않겠지? 죽고 싶지 않아. 하지만 진짜 가난해. 공격 때문에 좀 흥분했을 뿐이야. 다른 질문 있어?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> It's about time somebody did something to protect us poor citizens. I'm glad to hear the mayor is taking steps.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 누군가 우리 가난한 시민들을 보호하기 위해 뭔가 할 때가 됐지. 시장이 조치를 취하고 있다니 기쁘네.

TextEng: Here is my gold piece. That's all I have left. Took me a year to save up that much, but I am happy to part with it, if it goes towards saving my life.
Text: 여기 내 금화야. 이게 남은 전부야. 이만큼 모으는 데 1년이 걸렸지만, 내 목숨을 구하는 데 쓰인다면 기꺼이 내놓을게.

TextEng: Any other questions?
Text: 다른 질문 있어?

TextEng: This is a one-road village. You have lived here for years. What could you possibly need directions to?
Text: 여긴 길이 하나뿐인 마을이야. 넌 여기서 몇 년이나 살았잖아. 도대체 어디로 가는 길을 알아야 하는 거야?

TextEng: Well, I should hope not! Is there anything else?
Text: 글쎄, 아니길 바라야지! 다른 건 없어?

TextEng: Right across the road. Look for the sign that says 'Blacksmith'. How hard can this be?
Text: 길 바로 건너편이야. '대장간'이라고 쓰인 간판을 찾아. 이게 얼마나 어렵다고?

TextEng: Right across the road. Look for the sign that says 'Herbalist', unless Drogan never taught you to read.
Text: 길 바로 건너편이야. '약초상'이라고 쓰인 간판을 찾아, 드로건이 글 읽는 법을 안 가르쳐줬으면 모를까.

TextEng: Right across the street from the Community Hall.
Text: 마을 회관 바로 건너편이야.

TextEng: Right next door in the Community Hall. What else?
Text: 바로 옆 마을 회관에 있어. 다른 건?

TextEng: You picked the lock to my door so you could loot my hovel, probably broke the lock too, and now you just want to have a little chat? Hmm?
Text: 내 오두막을 털려고 내 문 자물쇠를 땄고, 아마 자물쇠도 부쉈을 텐데, 이제 그냥 잡담하자고? 응?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Hey, don't you threaten me. I'm good friends with the mayor and I'm on speaking terms with Drogan. You little upstarts don't worry me none.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 야 날 협박하지 마. 난 시장과 친한 친구고 드로건과도 말하는 사이야. 너 같은 신출내기들은 무섭지 않아.

TextEng: Just leave me alone. You'll get yours someday!
Text: 그냥 날 내버려 둬. 언젠가 벌 받을 거야!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Don't hurt me, please. I didn't do anything wrong! Why are you robbing me? I'm just a poor, lonely guy.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 때리지 마 제발. 난 아무 잘못도 안 했어! 왜 날 털어? 난 그냥 가난하고 외로운 사람이야.

TextEng: I... I guess I can give you my gold piece. That's all I have though. I would threaten to tell Drogan, but I guess you would hurt me if I did. I'll keep my mouth shut, I promise.
Text: 나... 내 금화를 줄 수 있을 것 같아. 하지만 그게 전부야. 드로건에게 말하겠다고 협박하고 싶지만, 그러면 날 때릴 것 같아. 입 다물고 있을게, 약속해.

TextEng: Just don't hurt me. Please just go away.
Text: 때리지만 마. 제발 그냥 가버려.

TextEng: With what, my carving knife? Give me a break. There are plenty of adventurers around here, including yourself. I wouldn't stand a chance. So is the fighting done or not?
Text: 뭘로, 내 조각칼로? 웃기지 마. 여기엔 너를 포함해서 모험가들이 많잖아. 난 상대가 안 돼. 그래서 싸움은 끝났어 안 끝났어?

TextEng: Oh, I see you came back. What do you want now?
Text: 오, 돌아왔구나. 이번엔 뭘 원해?

TextEng: Yes. Off you go to rob some other poor sap.
Text: 그래. 가서 다른 불쌍한 녀석을 털어.

TextEng: Just go away. I don't want to talk to you.
Text: 그냥 가버려. 너랑 얘기하고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: I cannot believe I got kicked out my house by that Red Wizard. He had some kind of permit from the mayor, but where will I sleep?
Text: 그 붉은 마법사한테 내 집에서 쫓겨났다니 믿을 수가 없어. 시장한테 뭔가 허가증을 받았다는데, 난 어디서 자라고?

TextEng: Toman
Text: 토만

TextEng: Bross
Text: 브로스
